definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Local secondary education is concentrated in the provincial capitals and some district centers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的中级教育主要集中在省会和其它一些行政中心。

sentences.english: He intermediate people's courts supervise the adjudication of primary people's courts under their respective jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 中级人民法院监督辖区内基层人民法院的审判工作。

sentences.english: Can I sit in on your Intermediate Hittite class?
sentences.chinese: 我能旁听你的“中级希泰语”课程吗？

sentences.english: Todd: There’s vacancy in middle management, you know.
sentences.chinese: 中级管理层有个职位空缺。

sentences.english: After the first instance verdict, Lin appealed to the Nanjing intermediate court.
sentences.chinese: 一审判决后，林某不服上诉至南京市中级法院。

sentences.english: Weak systems of secondary education feed into the problem of enrolling adequate numbers of students.
sentences.chinese: 由于中级教育系统薄弱，医学院校招不到足够的学生。

sentences.english: A group of higher or middle rank intellectuals have been admitted into the Party.
sentences.chinese: 一批优秀的高中级知识分子被吸收入党。

sentences.english: Intermediate knowledge of Lightwave as well as basic knowledge of After Effects are required to complete this tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 光波中级知识以及对基本知识后，必须完成本教程。

sentences.english: The company has more than 600 employees, among them, there are 88 senior engineers.
sentences.chinese: 公司现有员工600余人，其中高中级职称88人。

sentences.english: This is as I am teaching Islamic Studies to O-level students.
sentences.chinese: 因为我是一名给中级学生教伊斯兰研究的老师。

sentences.english: This test has intermediate and the high-level two ranks.
sentences.chinese: 该考试设中级和高级两个级别。

sentences.english: But why is this relevant to our mid-range automotive market in the industrialized world?
sentences.chinese: 但是它为什么和中级车市场有关系呢？

sentences.english: Study on Safety Input of Construction Engineering and Evaluation of Safe Management;
sentences.chinese: 注册安全工程师或至少是中级注册安全主任。

sentences.english: QB type explosion-proof hook bridge crane work level is intermediate.
sentences.chinese: QB型防爆吊钩桥式起重机工作级别为中级。

sentences.english: These coursebooks are designed for intermediate students.
sentences.chinese: 这些教科书是为中级水平的学生编写的。

definition: to skip a grade/to bypass ranks/to go over the head of one's boss
